    Donal Fellows

      • getAllowNewWorkflowRuns

        boolean getAllowNewWorkflowRuns()
        Returns:
        whether we allow the creation of new workflow runs.

      • getLogIncomingWorkflows

        boolean getLogIncomingWorkflows()
        Returns:
        whether we should log all workflows sent to us.

      • getLogOutgoingExceptions

        boolean getLogOutgoingExceptions()
        Returns:
        whether outgoing exceptions should be logged before being converted to responses.

      • getUsageRecordLogFile

        String getUsageRecordLogFile()
        Returns:
        the file that all usage records should be appended to, or null if they should be just dropped.

        Parameters:
        logOutgoingExceptions - whether outgoing exceptions should be logged before being converted to responses.

      • setUsageRecordLogFile

        void setUsageRecordLogFile(String usageRecordLogFile)
        Parameters:
        usageRecordLogFile - the file that all usage records should be appended to, or null if they should be just dropped.
